header.title: User Blog Mod
header.description: Adds Blogs to a phpBB3 board.
header.author-notes:
PHP versions less than 5.1.0 are NOT supported. Support will only be given at my website - http://www.lithiumstudios.org.
There is an extension that can be installed with this mod to extend it's integration with phpBB3. Those instructions are in contrib/install_extended.xml

action-group.diy-instructions:
Go to yoursite/blog.php?page=update in your web browser to update the database.
Because of the bug in previous versions of EAMI that were used to install the modules, the left and right id's for your modules are likely messed up. To fix this, go to this page and follow the instructions on how to run the script (and run it for your board): http://www.lithiumstudios.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=691
